languages.text: "Азуриани умеют адаптироваться. Вы немного замедляете меня, слегка мешаетесь в бою... но это терпимо".
"Asuryani are capable of adapting. You mon-keigh slow me down and slightly hinder me in combat... but it is tolerable."
languages.original_text: "Азуриани умеют адаптироваться. Вы немного замедляете меня, слегка мешаетесь в бою... но это терпимо".

traits.locale_text: "Asuryani are capable of adapting. You humans slow me down and slightly hinder me in combat... but it is tolerable."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Asuryani are capable of adapting. You humans slow me down and slightly hinder me in combat... but it is tolerable."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Asuryani are capable of adapting. You humans slow me down and slightly hinder me in combat... but it is tolerable."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Asuryani are capable of adapting. You mon-keigh slow me down and slightly hinder me in combat... but it is tolerable."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “方舟灵族有能力适应环境。你们这些猴子拖慢了我的速度，还会在战斗中稍微妨碍到我……不过都在可以忍受的程度之内。”
languages.original_text: "Asuryani are capable of adapting. You mon-keigh slow me down and slightly hinder me in combat... but it is tolerable."

traits.locale_text: “方舟灵族有能力适应环境。你们这些猴子拖慢了我的速度，还会在战斗中稍微妨碍到我……不过都在可以忍受的程度之内。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Los Asuryani somos más que capaces de adaptarnos. Los mon-keigh me retrasáis y me entorpecéis ligeramente en combate... pero es tolerable».
languages.original_text: "Asuryani are capable of adapting. You mon-keigh slow me down and slightly hinder me in combat... but it is tolerable."

traits.locale_text: «Los Asuryani somos más que capaces de adaptarnos. Los mon-keigh me retrasáis y me entorpecéis ligeramente en combate... pero es tolerable».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「アシュリャーニには適応能力がある。お前たちモン＝ケイは、私の動きを鈍らせ、戦闘に若干の支障となることもあるが…我慢できる範疇だ」
languages.original_text: "Asuryani are capable of adapting. You mon-keigh slow me down and slightly hinder me in combat... but it is tolerable."

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリャーニには適応能力がある。お前たちモン＝ケイは、私の動きを鈍らせ、戦闘に若干の支障となることもあるが…我慢できる範疇だ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Asuryani sind anpassungsfähig. Eure Chem-Pan-Sey bremsen mich und hindern mich ein wenig im Kampf ... aber das ist tolerabel."
languages.original_text: "Asuryani are capable of adapting. You mon-keigh slow me down and slightly hinder me in combat... but it is tolerable."

traits.locale_text: "Asuryani sind anpassungsfähig. Eure Chem-Pan-Sey bremsen mich und hindern mich ein wenig im Kampf ... aber das ist tolerabel."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Les Asuryanis sont parfaitement capables de s'adapter. Je ne nierai pas que les mon-keigh comme vous sont une gêne au combat, mais... ça reste tolérable. »
languages.original_text: "Asuryani are capable of adapting. You mon-keigh slow me down and slightly hinder me in combat... but it is tolerable."

traits.locale_text: « Les Asuryani sont parfaitement capables de s'adapter. Je ne nierai pas que les mon-keigh comme vous sont une gêne au combat, mais... ça reste tolérable. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Asuryani are capable of adapting. You mon-keigh slow me down and slightly hinder me in combat... but it is tolerable."

languages.text: "Asuryani uyum sağlamaya kadirdir. Siz mon-keighler beni yavaşlatıp çatışmada kısmen köstek olsanız da... Tahammül edebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Asuryani are capable of adapting. You mon-keigh slow me down and slightly hinder me in combat... but it is tolerable."

traits.locale_text: "Asuryani uyum sağlamaya kadirdir. Siz mon-keighler beni yavaşlatıp çatışmada kısmen köstek olsanız da... Tahammül edebiliyorum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
